displayName: Ensure the 'sa' Login Account has been renamed
rationale: It is more difficult to launch password-guessing and brute-force attacks against the `sa` login if the name is not known.
recommended_action:
Replace the _`<different_user>`_ value within the below syntax and execute to rename the `sa` login.
```
ALTER LOGIN sa WITH NAME = <different_user>;
```
error_message: Login Account 'sa' has not been renamed
ruleNames: Ensure the 'sa' Login Account has been renamed
